patthana16.48:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.48:4.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana16.48:4.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetusampayutto ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nahetusampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.48:4.6: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi … pe … avigate cha.
patthana16.48:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ hetuvippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetuvippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
